text: Edward Lopez Pastor (; June 28, 1943 â€“ November 27, 2018) was an American politician. He was born in Claypool, Arizona. He was Arizona's first Hispanic congressman. Pastor was a member of the United States House of Representatives from Arizona from 1991 to 2015. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He represented Arizona's 2nd congressional district from 1991 to 2003, and Arizona's 7th congressional district from 2003 to 2015. The latter district was numbered as the 4th district from 2003 to 2013. Pastor died on November 28, 2018 following a heart attack in Phoenix, Arizona at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:United States representatives from Arizona Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
